description:
Secure collaboration and messaging

Element is a Matrix-based end-to-end encrypted messenger and secure collaboration app. It‚Äôs decentralized for digital sovereign self-hosting, or through a hosting service such as Element Matrix Services. Element operates on the open Matrix network to provide interoperability and easy connections.
